Title: Marrowscroll Herald
Intro: A Marrowscroll Herald is armed with a Bone Scythe.

Rules.Name: Don’t Shoot The Messenger
Rules.Fluff: Marrowscroll Heralds are viewed as divine messengers by their ghoulish minions, who will go to any lengths to protect them.
Rules.Rule: Don’t Shoot the Messenger: This unit is not visible to enemy models while it is wholly within 6" of 5 or more other friendly FLESH-EATER COURTS models.
